Field Detail

INPUT_COLOR

public static final ShellPreference INPUT_COLOR
Shell preference to define the foreground color of the input text field. Default color is black.

INPUT_BACKGROUND

public static final ShellPreference INPUT_BACKGROUND
Shell preference to define the background color of the input text field. Default color is white.

INPUT_FONT

public static final ShellPreference INPUT_FONT
Shell preference to define the font of the input text field. The default font is current used system font.

OUTPUT_COLOR_INPUT

public static final ShellPreference OUTPUT_COLOR_INPUT
Shell preference to define the color of the shown user input within output text field. Default color is gray.

OUTPUT_COLOR_OUTPUT

public static final ShellPreference OUTPUT_COLOR_OUTPUT
Shell preference to define the color of the shell output (returned from database) within output text field. Default color is blue.

OUTPUT_COLOR_ERROR

public static final ShellPreference OUTPUT_COLOR_ERROR
Shell preference to define the color for errors within output text field. Default color is red.

OUTPUT_FONT

public static final ShellPreference OUTPUT_FONT
Shell preference to define the font of the output window. The default font is current used system font.

OUTPUT_BACKGROUND

public static final ShellPreference OUTPUT_BACKGROUND
Shell preference to define the background color of the output window. The default color is white.

MAX_HISTORY

public static final ShellPreference MAX_HISTORY
Shell preference to define the maximum amount of history entries. The default value is "100".

                        Class<?> _defaultClazz,

_defaultClazz - related class of the default value
